bug.author: tvst
bug.summary: Top-right menu icon not showing in Safari

comments.comment:
I can't repro this on my Safari: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/709022/70100587-042e6700-15e7-11ea-81cf-591dba97f8e8.png></denchmark-link>
(Hamburger menu appears in top-right and works as expected.) Maybe this was fixed along the way? I'm using Mac OS Mojave, 10.14.6
I can't repro this either on Safari in Catalina. This is an old report and no new info from the user. Closing!
